help.title: What I can do:
help.overview:
- Show your agenda and highlight meetings with transcripts
- Let you pick a meeting and summarize it
- Answer questions about a meeting transcript
- Reply in your language (auto-detected)
- You can ask in natural language (for example: "meetings from last Monday")
- Commands start with / and are not translated
- Use /help any time to see the full command list (including debug tools)
help.agenda: /agenda [today|tomorrow|week|yesterday|last 7 days] [keyword] - list meetings in a range, optional keyword filter
help.select: /select <number> - choose a meeting from the last agenda list
help.qa: /qa [lang] <question> - ask a question about the selected meeting
help.language: /language <code> - set your language (example: en, es, ro)
help.how: /how - how I work and what data I use
help.contribute: /contribute - how to contribute and repo link
help.whoami: /whoami - show debug info (user, tenant, token status)
help.graphdebug: /graphdebug - test Graph access and transcript availability
help.logs: /logs on|off - toggle debug logs for this chat
help.examples:
- check my agenda
- /agenda today design
- /select 2
- /summary
- /qa what did we decide?
- /language es
- /logs on

howItWorks: I use your calendar to list meetings, then look for meeting transcripts. If a meeting has a transcript, I can summarize it or answer questions. If no transcript exists, I will tell you.
contribute: To contribute, visit the Plain Concepts GitHub repo: {repoUrl}
languagePrompt: Please specify a language code (example: en, es, ro).

agenda.title: Your upcoming meetings
agenda.none: No meetings found for that range ({range}).
agenda.noneWithTranscript: No meetings with transcripts found for that range ({range}).
agenda.cannotAccess: I couldn't access your agenda yet. {message}

selection.invalid: Invalid selection. Choose one of the listed numbers.

transcript.notAvailable: No transcript available for that meeting.

meeting.notFound: I couldn't find a matching meeting.

fallback.unknown: I can help with your agenda, meeting summaries, or questions. Try: "show my meetings from last Monday".

auth.signIn: Please sign in so I can access your agenda and transcripts. After you click Sign in, you may be shown a 6-digit code (example: 646012). Copy and paste that code here in the chat — I’m waiting for it.
auth.waitingForCode: If you see a 6-digit code, paste it here. I’ll confirm as soon as I receive it.
auth.codeInvalid: I received your code, but I couldn't verify it. If you were shown a 6-digit code, paste it here as the second step of sign-in. Otherwise, click Sign in again.
auth.signedIn: You're signed in. I received your code — ask me about your meetings.
auth.signedOut: You're signed out. If you want to continue, use /agenda and sign in again.
auth.signOutNotConfigured: Sign-out isn't available because OAuth is not configured for this bot.
